name: Beth Burgess
text: The crust tasted dry like maybe the pizza was less than fresh.  I support the business and overall have had good experiences, but this time was not the best.

name: Matthew Andersen
text: Man I donâ€™t know where to begin, good staff, pizza was made to perfection, wonderful manners, hire my boy Trent back

name: Farah Foster
text: Great staff hard working people and will stop at nothing to satisfy your needs.

name: Jeff Jens
text: I will never eat here again after the removal of the greatest RGM Glenwood Pizza Hut has ever had, Trenton Rannells. He kept up on everything, everyday, all day at that specific restaurant and was treated and dealt with poorly in return.

name: Tim Truhlicka
text: No facemasks or gloves. Order was no where near correct. Asked for a refund and employee Justin slammed the window after giving the refund. Wouldnâ€™t  advise anyone to do business there.

name: Molly Bower
text: Used to be one of my fav pizza places, but I ordered tonight and it has definitely went DOWN HILL. It was like there was no crust, it was just super thin $ usually itâ€™s not like that. I ordered the parmasean crust, and it was just normal crust. Donâ€™t think I will be going back there.

name: Sonja Fisher
text: The delivery was fast  and the driver stayed at a safe disyance

text: Pizza was delivered cold and the topping were stuck to the top of the box like it wS upside down i  the box at one time. Also took 45 min to deliver it. We got notifications when our pizza was on its way and we called after 30 min and was told it would get here when it got here. Terrible customer service.

text: loved the Beyond Italian Sausage pizza

name: Wendy Evans
text: Great service and good food

name: Marie Turpen
text: No face masks or gloves on the 2 workers. My friends and I are concerned  with COVID19. I was shocked, talked of  making sure all knew if we get COVID it probably came from Glenwood Pizza Hut

name: Brandon Julich
text: Congratulations on messing up an order twice in a row. Ordered a large chicken bacon parmesan with mushrooms and a drizzle of buffalo on top. First time with no drizzle and didnt cut it. Now the second time you didnt even put the white â€¦More

name: David Kuhnert
text: The past year I feel that complacency has cause this pizza hut from good to okay. I have had my orders put in wrong multiple times and therefore having to wait quite a while longer to get my order. I will say that every mistake they have made they corrected and compensated me with more food or free food.

name: gerald Mahoney
text: The cook was the one that helped me! He gave me two drinks and my order. The girl that  was to take care of me did nothing but bring a bill! The food was very good

name: Seagull Meat
text: So. When someone says boneless they usually expect boneless but apparently that doesn't apply.

name: service service
text: Still no face masks or gloves being worn :(

name: Trust in YHWH
text: Poor service and expensive

name: Rhonda Collier
text: Our waitress is the best , her name is Jessica,Great Customer Service She gives to everyone who sits in her station. Go out to Pizza Hut in Glenwood Iowa, and ask for  Jessica waitress  she is the best .Love to go there we drive from Co.Bluffs ,Good food ,Good Company.

name: Darrol Tribbie
text: I love the hot ham and cheese sandwich.

name: Don Gamble
text: Pizza is always hot and fresh

name: Marilynn Fidler
text: Ordered pasta which comes with garlic bread.  Asked for cheese added on garlic bread.  Instead given 2 side orders of cheese bread at additional charge.  Pasta was dry and all edges had no sauce so they were burnt n dry n hard.  No peppers â€¦More

name: Nancy Louise
text: Salad bar and good pizza. Love thin flavored crust.

name: Joshua Lowe
text: Refused service 15 mins before close, saying that they were closed and that the general manager was okay with this. Continuous refusal of service even though they were not closed. This is unethical and rude.

name: Zombie Clutch
text: Went to the buffet twice last week. NO PEPPERONI pizza?? On a buffet?? Won't be back. The first time buffet Dint have any pizza's on the buffet untill almost 12...

name: Abigail Evans
text: They were vacuuming the entire time we were there eating and it was 3 hours till closing. We did not get our appetizer before our meal. The pizza did not have the crust flavoring and had a hair on it. They ended up giving us our meal for free.

name: Rhonda Collier
text: The pizza hut in Glenwood,is nice place to eat at visit with friends,and family.

name: William Clarke
text: Some off the pizza on the buffet sat to long before they did anything about it an the salad bar was not fully stocked the crew just needs to pay attention to to the buffet . Trust me it wasn't that busy today .on 8 /29/ 2019

name: 404 Sec
text: Great place to eat, not usually a pizzahut fan but this location has been around for years and I have been there off and on throughout my life. Lots of my family has worked here.

name: Deborah Boyle
text: The bathrooms were not clean. The floor we sat at had food and paper on the floor the soda machine was not working so 2 of us could not get thier choice but the pizza was very good

name: Bridget Study
text: Staff very un interested food ok

name: Samantha Pierce
text: This pizza hut has made some changes recently, and you can tell. Food is fresh, dining room is clean, and the employees are polite! If you have ever had a bad experience here I really encourage you to give it another try!

name: Casey
text: Very poor quality food on numerous occasions. Pizza with very little cheese even when I paid extra for extra cheese. Pasta is dried out with very little sauce. Reported issues to pizza hut and never heard a word from the owner.

name: Katie Wright
text: Ordered delivery for two items to be delivered to me at work less than 3 blocks from the Pizza Hut in Glenwood. Waited 1hour and 30min for my food when they said it would be delivered in 30 minutes, for my food cold. Called store, manger â€¦More

name: Royene Bozek
text: Went there for the lunch buffet. It was okay. The ticket was left on our table before even getting back to the table with the 1st plate. Also had to track down a server to get a drink refill. It wasn't super busy or anything either. Just felt kinda rushed to leave.

name: Dustin Warnick
text: Called about online price, was told I had to order online to get that price. Person on the phone was rude. Placed oder online, received phone call within minutes telling me they were out of the thin crust. Girl on that phone call was rude â€¦More

name: Steve Points
text: It was pretty good nice people

name: Rodney Veldhuizen
text: Even with good intentions and water restrictions, The Hut delivers. ðŸ™‹

text: Thursday early evening. I was very happy with the quality.

name: Nancy Wright
text: The Sunday buffet offered several choices.  Our family enjoyed it.

name: Maddie Belknap
text: Ordered buffalo wings and got honey bbq. Whatever you do DO NOT ORDER FROM Pizza Hut IN GLENWOOD

name: John Dorsey
text: Food is terrible when you get delivered but of you go to buffet its usually good

name: Ã€lÃ n Been
text: Ordered hand tossed. They brought us thin crust. Pizza was greasy...never have had a greasy pizza before..... And drowned in garlic! Worst pizza ever. Bathroom filthy. Mirror looked like someone threw up on it. I will never eat the Hut again. I'm done.

name: Ebony Belt
text: If I could give this place zero stars I would. They can never seem to get my family's carry-out orders right and from what I've heard they barely pass health inspections. Spend the extra money to either go to the other pizza place in town or just go out of town, it'll be far more worth it.

name: Matthew Andersen
text: Trent Rannells is the best rgm in the business, I tell you if he was any better he would be the president of the United states, no one compares to him. No one bruh.

name: Justin Schnurr
text: The serivce isnt half bad. But the food could be alot better. The wings never get covered in sauce and always has a pool of sauce in the bottom of the wing.

name: Dawn
text: I DO NOT recommend this place to ANYONE. They could really care less about their customers. We placed an order at 8:45 one night (we are always conscious about what time restaurants close and we try to refrain from ordering close to closing â€¦More

name: Proxy 99
text: We go here about once a month and they are yet to get a single order right for carry out. Either something small like the wrong seasoning on fries, or something bigger like order chicken taco pizza and getting beef, getting buffalo chicken pizza where they FORGOT THE BUFFALO SAUCE! This place has gone to heck since ladena left!

name: Samantha nurse
text: Lunch buffet was finishing as we got there.  The waitress seemed annoyed and kept mumbling our order so I couldn't understand her then when they brought our order over they had given my husband the wrong thing then walked off before I could â€¦More

name: Crissa Hicks
text: I had called ahead to make sure they had what I wanted and they had told me yes. When we got to the restaurant it had the horrible smell of old fryer oil, but we went ahead sat down and ordered. A couple minutes later our waiter came back â€¦More

name: B & Jess Smith
text: What an improvement since our last visit over a year ago. The place is clean, the waitress was helpful, had a great sense of humor, and a real sense of urgency to assure we were satisfied customers, thanks you Jess. I'll be back and â€¦More

name: Alanna Reeves
text: The restaurant recently changed owners and went downhill fast.  Dishes aren't washed quickly, so they hand out plasticware and to-go cups even when eating in the restaurant, tables aren't bussed quickly, and service takes eons, not to â€¦More

text: Buffett tastes like a day old pizza

text: So I called trying to order a calzone needed to pay with my debit card and couldn't figure it out online. So the guy I talked too couldn't help me but asked his manager who also didn't know how which didn't nearly both me as much as the â€¦More

name: Josh Lowell
text: Unwilling to feed a stranded, hungry person because l was 8 minutes away at the Bluff View Motel. Apparently, service and care for a fellow human is not to be expected by this company. Unbelievable. Never going to Pizza Hut, and l would only go to their disgusting establishment if l had to anyway.
